details.description:
Famously seen on Allen Iverson's feet when he crossed over Michael Jordan as a rookie, the Reebok Question Mid Blue Toe made its return in 2022.

The Reebok Question Mid Blue Toe tributes Allen Iverson's breakout superstardom in 1996. In a simple format, the design features an white tumbled leather upper with pearlized blue leather toe and heel wraps. Embroidered Reebok branding on the vamp brings a retro feel. Making up its thick sole, Hexalite cushioning adds stability and responsiveness.

The Reebok Question Mid Blue Toe released in August of 2022 and retailed for $160.

name: Reebok Question Mid Maison Margiela Memory Of Black

details.description:
The Reebok Question Mid Maison Margiela Memory Of Black is a mid-top shoe that was designed as part of a partnership with the French luxury brand.

This iteration of the Reebok Question Mid comes with a paneled black smooth leather upper. There are separate panels for the toe box, eyestays, and sides, and the heel panel contains sections of cushioning. The front lacing system is locked down with transparent pieces in the middle, and the tongue features transparent plastic with a pattern underneath. The chunky black midsole features two shiny elements inside the curves on each side, and a black outsole completes the look.

What we like most about this sneaker is the fact that the branding is so subtle that it‚Äôs barely noticeable, allowing the design to do the talking. The Reebok Question Mid Maison Margiela Memory Of Black was released on May 20, 2022, for $400.

name: Reebok Question Mid Maison Margiela Memory Of White

details.description:
The Reebok Question Mid Maison Margiela Memory Of White is a mid-top silhouette designed as part of a collaboration with French luxury fashion brand Maison Margiela.

The Maison Margiela Memory Of White Reebok Question Mid has a paneled white leather upper. Separate panels form the eyestays, mudguard, toe box, and heel counter, while off-white cushioning peeks through each side and at the heel. The eyestays feature a unique design in which the laces are wrapped around them, making for a secure fit. The number 22 is seen on the heel, and the cushioning elements in the midsole are seen through two transparent panels under the heel and the forefoot. The midsole is chunky and white, and the shoe sits on a gray outsole.

Our favorite features of this shoe are the unique eye stays, which add both functionality and style. The Reebok Question Mid Maison Margiela Memory Of White was released on May 20, 2022, for $400.

name: Reebok Question Mid Panini Tiger Prizm

details.description:
Allen Iverson represented the U.S. as part of the 2004 Olympic team that competed in Athens. While the team didn't take home the gold metal that year, Reebok still honored Iverson almost two decades later by releasing the Reebok Question Mid Team USA. This shoe commemorates the time AI put in for the red, white, and blue to play for his country.

This patriotic Reebok Question has an upper made out of leather, suede, and mesh that is covered with a Vector Navy color. It also has bright pops of white on the toe box, heel, midsole, and outsole along with small red accents on the laces and lining. There is metallic silver stitching as well that serves to tie the look of this entire sneaker together.

But in our expert opinion, the most interesting thing about this sneaker is that it replaces AI's usual jersey number 3 with his Olympic jersey number 4 on the back. It helps differentiate this Question from other Questions that Reebok has put out in the past. The Reebok Question Mid Team USA was released on July 30, 2021, for a $140 retail price.

name: Reebok Question Mid Why Not Us

details.description:
The Reebok Question Mid Why Not Us commemorates an inspiring postgame speech by Allen Iverson after leading his team to recover a 21-point deficit in nine minutes during the 2001 All-Star Game in Washington, DC.

While the Reebok Question Mid arrives in a white colorway, the front has a black leather toe cap contrasting the rest of the shoe. The quarters feature several overlays, all in white, with the Vector logo appearing in black near the sole. Black and white panels cover most of the heel, leaving a cut-out at the counter where an embroidered question mark appears alongside the Vector motif. This shoe sits on a white midsole with black DMX cushioning at the heel and a translucent outsole. The heel displays a black patch with a bold "3" in white, paying homage to Iverson’s jersey number.

The throat of the Reebok Question Mid Why Not Us is among its most outstanding features. It features black webbed eyelets adorned with a white letter to spell Reebok. This shoe was released on March 6th, 2021, for $140.

name: Reebok Question Mid Vintage Red Toe

details.description:
The Reebok Question Mid Denver Nuggets pays homage to Allen Iverson's iconic sneaker legacy and his time with the Denver Nuggets.

This basketball shoe features an upper crafted with a mix of premium materials, offering durability on and off the court. The mid-cut design provides ankle support, while a dynamic lacing system ensures a secure fit. The shoe employs signature Hexalite cushioning technology in the midsole to deliver responsive and comfortable all-day wear. The outsole, designed with a herringbone pattern, delivers optimal traction on any type of surface.

What our experts love most about the Reebok Question Mid Denver Nuggets, however, is the elements of team branding incorporated in the number "3" on the heel and in the distinctive color palette, which combines hues of Cloud White, Fluid Blue, and Toxic Yellow. This shoe originally retailed with a price tag of $160 when it first released on November 25th, 2022.

name: Reebok Question Mid Black and Blue

details.description:
The Reebok Question Mid Black Gold is a mid-top basketball sneaker from Allen Iverson’s Question silhouette in a "Black Gold" colorway. 

This Question Mid features a black upper made of leather, suede, and mesh, highlighted by contrasting Metallic Gold accents on the "Reebok" wording on the lateral eyestays, heel branding, Allen Iverson’s "3" logo on the rear outsole, and the Reebok Vector logo on the sides, tongue, insole, and medial eyestays. The upper rests on a black sole unit comprising an EVA midsole cushioned with Hexalite Gold honeycombs visible at the heel and forefoot atop a semi-translucent outsole. 

What our experts particularly love about this Reebok Question Mid is its iconic design and colorway. The color scheme gives it a sleek and stylish look, while the premium construction contributes to its timeless and distinctive nature. The Reebok Question Mid Black Gold was made available on October 14th, 2022. Initially, it retailed at $140.

name: Reebok Question Mid Red Toe 25th Anniversary

details.description:
2020 was a good year for Allen Iverson’s famed Reebok Question, and the release of the original suede toe colorway was even more evidence of the sneaker’s prominent return. During A.I.’s prime, the Basketball Hall of Famer wore Questions as he crossed over none other than Michael Jordan in 1996. The sneaker has been a classic for Reebok ever since.

The Reebok Question Mid Red Toe 25th Anniversary brings back the sneaker in OG form. The upper is made of white tumbled leather and hits of red on the Reebok Delta logo and lace loops. The midsole displays the brand’s signature "Hexalite" cushioning technology, present in many of Iverson’s signature kicks. The toebox is the most notable detail, with its red suede patch that adds luxe elements to the sneaker.

The Reebok Question Mid Red Toe 25th Anniversary released in August for $150.

The Reebok Question Pink Toe features a white tumbled leather upper with a pale pink suede toe wrap and matching eyelets. A pink semi-translucent outsole offers a tonal complement to shades of pink found in the design's detailing.

The Reebok Question Pink Toe was released in November of 2021 and retailed for $150.

name: Reebok Question Mid Answer to No One
Reebok Question Mid Double Toe Anuel AA

details.description: The Reebok Question Mid Hot Ones is a limited edition sneaker that pays homage to the popular YouTube series, Hot Ones. This shoe features a unique design that is sure to turn heads, with a red and orange colorway that is inspired by the show's signature hot sauce bottles. The upper is made of premium leather and suede, with perforations for breathability. The midsole is made of EVA foam for cushioning and support, while the outsole is made of durable rubber for traction. Released on February 18, 2021, the Reebok Question Mid Hot Ones retails for $160. This shoe is a must-have for fans of the show and sneakerheads alike, as it combines style and comfort in a unique way. The attention to detail in the design is impressive, with Hot Ones branding on the tongue and insole, as well as a special lace lock that resembles a hot sauce bottle cap. Something we love about the Reebok Question Mid Hot Ones is the way it captures the spirit of the Hot Ones show in a sneaker. Our experts think the standout feature of this shoe is the bold colorway, which is sure to make a statement. Overall, we love the attention to detail and quality materials used in this limited edition release.
